Miscellaneous Highlights: The Rockies hold a team ERA of 5.44 this year (30th in baseball)
The Tigers hold a team slugging percentage of.387 and they score 4.27 runs per contest (17th in MLB)
Others: The Rockies have notched a total of 3,827 putouts for the season, in addition to 1,403 assists and 74 errors.
The Tigers have gotten 115 double plays and have a fielding percentage of.986 (13th in professional baseball)
